translation: Mais, mais, mais! Dê-me segundos, Mãe!
source: More, more, more! Give me seconds, Mother!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Dê-me o verde e o vermelho, também. Por favor! Por favor!
source: Give me the green and the red, too. Please! Please!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Feio, perspicaz, míope, hipermétrope, feio, perspicaz, míope, hipermétrope...
source: Unsightly, insightful, nearsighted, farsighted, unsightly, insightful, nearsighted, farsighted...{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Estou ferido. Meus ossos! Meus ossos! Eeee hee hee hee!
source: I'm wounded. My bones! My bones! Eeee hee hee hee!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Direita, direita, então esquerda. Agora, ataque!
source: Right, right, then left. Now, attack!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Faça isso! Faça isso! Faça isso! Faça isso! Faça isso!
source: Do it! Do it! Do it! Do it! Do it!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Eu comi a carne do morto naquele dia! Minha ereção me cansou!
source: I ate the {25B2}meat{25BC} of the {25B2}dead{25BC} that day! My {25B2}erection{25BC} tired me out!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Esquadrão, avance!
source: Squadron, forward!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Avance! Avance!
source: Forward! Forward!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Avance! Avance! Avance!
source: Forward! Forward! Forward!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Dê-me um braço, você idiota!
source: Give me an arm, you fool!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Estou ferido! É bom conhecer você!
source: I'm wounded! It's good to meet you!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: E você também, meu amigo ferido!
source: And you as well, my wounded friend!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Água... Alguém me dê água!
source: Water... Someone give me water!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Você... Pegue isso...!
source: You... Take this...!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Vejo uma cabana agradável na floresta!
source: I see a quaint little hut in the forest!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: E dentro dessa cabana, há um grande homem-pêssego-lagarto!
source: And inside that hut, there's a great big man-peach-lizard!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Um homem-pêssego-lagarto, você diz? Esses são os piores! Aaaargh!
source: A man-peach-lizard, you say? Those are the worst! Aaaargh!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Sinto falta...da minha Mãe...
source: I miss...my Mother...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Quando...essa batalha terminar...finalmente verei você...
source: When...this battle is over...I'll finally see you...{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Assim que eu ver a Mãe... Ela vai fazer...sua sopa branca para mim!
source: Once I see Mother... I'll have her make...her white soup for me!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: E um bife branco...e uma salada branca também!
source: And a white steak...and some white salad, too!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Branco! Branco! ...Preto? ...Não, branco!
source: White! White! ...Black? ...No, white!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Zero está aqui! Ela voa...como uma borboleta!
source: Zero's here! She flies...like a butterfly!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Essa coisa é Zero!?
source: That thing's Zero!?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Não... É uma flor!
source: No... It's a flower!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Não fuja!
source: Don't run away!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Não fuja!
source: Don't run away!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Huh? É Zero! A flor nascida do ovo...
source: Huh? It's Zero! The flower born from the egg...{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Essa floresta é horrível. Nenhuma pessoa sã{LF}poderia viver aqui.
source: This forest is horrifying. No sane{LF}person could ever live here.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Mmm? Eu não me importo tanto.
source: Mmm? I don't mind it so much.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Ele disse pessoa SÃ, Cent.{LF}Isso significa não você.
source: He said SANE person, Cent.{LF}That means not you.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ele disse pessoa SANA, Cent.{LF}Isso significa não você.{#Name="Dito"}
source: He said SANE person, Cent.{LF}That means not you.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Cinco? Eu pensei que eu o matei.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Five? I thought I killed you.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Você é um idiota. Você se ressuscitou?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You dumbass. You resurrected yourself?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Levante...Galgaliel.{#Name="Five"}
source: Arise...Galgaliel.{#Name="Five"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Dito"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Oh, Five! Você está melhor do que nunca agora!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Oh, Five! You're looking better than ever now!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Este é exatamente o tipo de mundo insano que eu sempre quis!{#Name="Dito"}
source: This is exactly the kind of insane world I've always wanted!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: É justo perfeito para um sapo indesejável como eu!{LF}Eu acho que vou ficar aqui PARA SEMPRE!{#Name="Dito"}
source: It's just perfect for an undesirable sap like me!{LF}I think I'm gonna stay here FOREVER!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Eu amo esse novo você, Five.{LF}Você pode fazer o que quiser comigo. Qualquer coisa.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I love this new you, Five.{LF}You can do whatever you want to me. Anything at all.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ei, Z...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hey, Z...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Parece que seu número está no fim!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Looks like your number's up!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Fanuel, levante!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Phanuel, arise!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Egregori, dance!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Egregori, dance!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Eu posso lidar com esses caras...{LF}Talvez você possa cuidar de Five?{#Name="Cent"}
source: I can handle these guys...{LF}Maybe you can take care of Five?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: O que Five está fazendo aqui na{LF}floresta em vez de Three?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What's Five doing here in the{LF}forest instead of Three?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Talvez Accord estivesse certo sobre{LF}o mundo se desintegrar.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Perhaps Accord was right about{LF}the world breaking down.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Oh, porra.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Oh, for fuck's sake.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Isso é incrível! Oh meu Deus,{LF}esse lugar é incrível!{#Name="Dito"}
source: This is great! Oh my gosh,{LF}this place is freaking great!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Olhe para isso, Cent! É incrível!{LF}Tem sangue e vísceras e...tudo!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Look at it, Cent! It's amazing!{LF}There's blood and guts and...everything!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: É um mundo onde só o feio é bonito!{#Name="Dito"}
source: It's a world where only ugly is beautiful!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: E um mundo onde os idiotas são gênios!{LF}Então, junte-se a mim, Cent!{#Name="Dito"}
source: And a world where idiots are geniuses!{LF}So join me, Cent!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Meeeeee?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Meeeeee?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Sim! Você! Vamos, eu sei que você{LF}odeia o mundo em que você está.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah! You! Come on, I know you{LF}hate the world you're in.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Eu sempre soube!{LF}Está escrito em toda a sua face!{#Name="Dito"}
source: I've known it forever!{LF}It's written all over your face!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Mmmm? É tão óbvio, é?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Mmmm? That obvious, is it?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Bem, eu suponho que possa ser o caso.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Well, I suppooose that might be the case.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Mas mesmo se eu fosse se juntar a você nesse mundo...{#Name="Cent"}
source: But even if I were to join you in that world...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Não reviveria Lady Two.{#Name="Cent"}
source: It wouldn't revive Lady Two.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Huh?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Huh?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Meu lugar era ao lado dela.{LF}É realmente tudo o que eu sempre tive...{#Name="Cent"}
source: My place was by her side.{LF}It's really all I ever had...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Ugh, que diabo, homem?{LF}Você soa como um adolescente apaixonado.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ugh, what the hell, man?{LF}You sound like a lovesick teenager.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Me faz querer vomitar minhas entranhas todas no chão...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Makes me wanna puke my guts all over the floor...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Zero... Zero...{#Name="Five"}
source: Zero... Zero...{#Name="Five"}

translation: Eu... Eu... Eu estou...tão...t-t-t-t-triste...{#Name="Five"}
source: I... I... I'm...so...s-s-s-sad...{#Name="Five"}

translation: Eu... Eu-Eu-Eu-Eu-Eu... Eu sempre...{#Name="Five"}
source: I... I-I-I-I-I... I'll...alwaaays...{#Name="Five"}

translation: adore...you...Z...Z-Ze...ro...{#Name="Five"}
source: adore...you...Z...Z-Ze...ro...{#Name="Five"}

translation: ゼゼゼゼゼ……ゼ……ロ……お姉様……すすすすすすす……て……きき{#Name="ファイブ"}
source: ゼゼゼゼゼ……ゼ……ロ……お姉様……すすすすすすす……て……きき{#Name="ファイブ"}

translation: How did a beauty like Five ever{LF}end up in such a sad state?{#Name="Octa"}
source: How did a beauty like Five ever{LF}end up in such a sad state?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I'm guessing the flower's force{LF}willed her body back to life.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm guessing the flower's force{LF}willed her body back to life.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But neither one could handle the other,{LF}so now we have this.{#Name="Zero"}
source: But neither one could handle the other,{LF}so now we have this.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Stupid bastard should have just stayed dead.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Stupid bastard should have just stayed dead.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: A sad sight indeed...{#Name="Octa"}
source: A sad sight indeed...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: She seems to be in pain... I'd be glad{LF}to ease it with my staff of miracles!{#Name="Octa"}
source: She seems to be in pain... I'd be glad{LF}to ease it with my staff of miracles!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: やめておけ。アイツは昔から快感のわからない女なんだ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: やめておけ。アイツは昔から快感のわからない女なんだ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Of all the sisters, the flower's grip{LF}on Zero is by far the strongest.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Of all the sisters, the flower's grip{LF}on Zero is by far the strongest.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I fear she, too, will be consumed...{#Name="Octa"}
source: I fear she, too, will be consumed...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Hm? What's that?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hm? What's that?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Nothing, my lady.{#Name="Octa"}
source: ...Nothing, my lady.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Z-Zero... Beauti...ful Zero...{#Name="Five"}
source: Z-Zero... Beauti...ful Zero...{#Name="Five"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Five"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Five"}

translation: See ya in hell,{#Name="Zero"}
source: See ya in hell,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Sister.{#Name="163"}
source: Sister.{#Name="163"}

translation: Huh? Wait, what the hell is this!?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Huh? Wait, what the hell is this!?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You summoned an angel without the aid of an Intoner.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You summoned an angel without the aid of an Intoner.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Vou ter que pagar por isso de alguma forma.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Gonna have to pay for it somehow.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, vamos! Isso não é justo!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Oh, come on! That's not even fair!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Finalmente encontrei!{#Name="Dito"}
source: I finally found it!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Finalmente encontrei um mundo em que posso viver e amar de verdade!{#Name="Dito"}
source: I finally found a world I can live in and truly love!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Zero, espera. Não! Não não não não não não não—{#Name="Dito"}
source: Zero, wait. No! No no no no no no no—{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Cent...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Cent...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Então é assim, é?{#Name="Cent"}
source: So that's how it is, huh?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Eu honestamente não sabia.{#Name="Cent"}
source: I honestly had no idea.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Sou apenas um idiota, afinal, certo?{#Name="Cent"}
source: I am just an idiot, after all, right?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Oh bem.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Oh well.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Não há ponto em viver em um mundo sem Lady Two, de qualquer maneira. Agora posso descansar.{#Name="Cent"}
source: There's no point in living in a world without Lady Two anyway. Now I can rest.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Faça seu caminho por essa floresta amaldiçoada.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Make your way through this cursed forest.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Preciso de apoio aqui! Dê-me som e tempo!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: I need backup here! Give me sound and time!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: S-Som? E tempo? Não entendo!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: S-Sound? And time? I don't understand!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Parece que eles ainda têm controle parcial{LF}de si mesmos...{#Name="Octa"}
source: It seems they still have partial{LF}control of themselves...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Espere. Eles nem mesmo percebem que estão mortos!?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Wait. They don't even realize they're dead!?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ha ha ha! Isso é incrível,{LF}não aguento!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ha ha ha! That's so awesome,{LF}I can't stand it!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Five"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Five"}

translation: S...st... Pare...ppp...{#Name="Five"}
source: S...st... Stop...ppp...{#Name="Five"}

translation: Eu comi a carne das maçãs naquele dia! Minha explosão me deixou cansado!{#Name="Soldado G"}
source: I ate the meat of the apples that day! My explosion tired me out!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Derrote o exército de Galgaliel!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the army of Galgaliel!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Derrote Cinco!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat Five!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Ah, vamos. Ela se curou sozinha!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Oh, come on. She healed herself!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Nós melhoramos cuidar daqueles caras primeiro.{#Name="Zero"}
source: We better take care of those guys first.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Poxa! Esses caras são invencíveis!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Goddammit! Are these guys invincible!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Então eles são imortais enquanto Cinco estiver acordado, é?{#Name="Zero"}
source: So they're immortal as long as Five's awake, huh?{#Name="Zero"}
